Detailed Description

Pseudo-random generation of standard distributed deviates.

For details about this distribution, see Wikipedia - Normal distribution.

This implementation is based on the Box-Muller algorithm for generating random deviates with a normal distribution.

For details of the algorithm, see Numerical recipes in C (chapter 7)

pdf: f(x) = 1/sqrt(2*Pi)*exp(-x^2/2)
